Obsequium et Veritas, or, A dialogue between London and Southwark, concerning the sitting and dissolutuion of the last Parliament at Oxford, March 21st, 1681 in a dialogue betwixt a shoo-maker, and a taylor. Hearn, R.
1 sheet (2 p.)
Printed for the author, London : 1681.
Broadside. Signed: R. Hearn. Caption title. In double columns. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
